ruleBookInfo.intro:
<js>
var str=""
if(java.get("mid")){
   let mid = java.get("mid")
   let param = `api?type=lrc&mid=${mid}`;
 

    var postUrl =  java.webView(null,"https://suapi.net/tool/music",`sign_url("${param}&token="+document.getElementById("music-so").getAttribute("token"))`)

/*
   let html = java.ajax("https://suapi.net/tool/music");
let token = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(html).select("#music-so").attr("token");

eval(String(source.bookSourceComment));
var postUrl =  sign_url(param+`&token=${token }`)
*/
	
str =java.ajax("https://suapi.net/tool/"+postUrl )
}
str
</js>

ruleContent.content:
<js>
let mid = java.hexDecodeToString(result);
let param = `api?type=url&mid=${mid}`;


var postUrl =  java.webView(null,"https://suapi.net/tool/music",`sign_url("${param}&token="+document.getElementById("music-so").getAttribute("token"))`)

/*
let html = java.ajax("https://suapi.net/tool/music");
let token = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(html).select("#music-so").attr("token");

eval(String(source.bookSourceComment));
var postUrl =  sign_url(param+`&token=${token }`)
*/

let result = java.get("https://suapi.net/tool/"+postUrl , {});

let url = result.header("Location");
java.log(url )
url
</js>

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
let arr = [];
try {
 let obj = JSON.parse(java.hexDecodeToString(result));
 arr.push({
  title: obj.title,
  url: `data:;base64,${java.base64Encode(obj.mid)},{"type":"text"}`
 })
} catch (error) {
 java.log(error)
}
arr
</js>
